Text: Instead of the "save" button I had on my former version, on the lower right of the subtitles window, it appears only "Add a new subtitle line". The "save" button is gone and I can't find it nowhere! Is this a bug?

Hi,

  We don't know much about this Program. Maybe this is because of the new version, they deleted the 'Save' button. If you're sure it has to be there, contact the producers of BS Player.
